tracks.text: Funimation

Sunlight breaks over the skyscrapers. Window panes cast shadows over chairs, a witness stand, a gavel, and the courtroom. The shadows move as the sun rises until it reaches above the judge's seat, where the scales of justice emblazon a golden seal. The sun's reflection fills our view with light. Blue on black text Japanese appears. Ace Attorney. The world you see.

Phoenix Wright, wearing a blue suit, white shirt, and red tie runs along the sidewalk, a city in backdrop. Wright is an otherwise average man with slicked back hair that makes him look like he's going fast.
Wright stumbles and almost trips. There are children's chalk drawings on the sidewalk, and he carefully avoids stepping on them. Once clear, he turns back and smiles.

Maya Faye wears a yellow teardrop pendant. She has long black hair, wears a white robe down to her mid thigh, red ribbon, and purple haori jacket. She prays in a small room surrounded by candles. She turns around and a smoky aura surrounds her. A blue teardrop stone falls and shatters.
Rain soaks Wright as he stands face up, eyes closed, dark clouds covering the skyscrapers behind him. He faces forward, balls his fists, and starts to run.
Miles Edgeworth, wearing a red suit, walks along the beach, waves lapping at his footprints. He turns around to see Wright standing behind him.
Wright pants, steels his gaze, then raises his hand, shackled by a glowing golden chain. Edgeworth looks down at the gold chain on his wrist, and yanks it, yelling.

The 2 hold the sides of the gold chain taught. Red and blue pillars of light shoot the 2 into the air, standing on either side of a golden rod. We spin around the 2 men as they scream. They arrive at the 2 arms of the scales of justice, and explode in fireworks of red and blue.
The scales explode into light and erupt across a field, leaving sparkling sunflowers in its wake.
The sunflowers replace the suburbs.
Wright runs past sunflowers. Maya, Larry Butz, and Detective Gumshoe run after him.
Mia Faye walks by in black and white heels, a black suit jacket and miniskirt, low-cut white bouse, and yellow scarf.
Wright stops running and turns to look at her. Mia looks at him. She wears a blue teardrop pendant.
He nods, slaps a table in front of him, explodes in a blue nebula, points forward and shouts. On the other side of a courtroom, the man points, shouts, and explodes in a red nebula.
Mount Fuji peaks between skyscrapers. Phoenix Wright points at us.
Turnabout Sisters - 2nd Trial
April 6, 10 AM, District Court, Courtroom Number 1.
Defense Lawyer, Phoenix Wright.
Prosecutor, Miles Edgeworth
Defendant, Maya Fey
Maya looks at Wright, who nods.
The Judge sits.
TV screens appear around the judge.
Witness Testimony
A woman with pink high heels, a mini skirt with a side slit, and pink jacket revealing plunging cleavage, and pink hair. She has a pink heart on her jacket.
She winks. Judge blushes. Wright sweats.
Witness Testimony
May bounces.
Wright presses a button.
Edgeworth bows, with a flourish.
Maya sighs.
Fey and Company Law Offices. Wright reads a book at a desk.
Grossberg takes out a photo featuring a man with purple hair, gold rings, and a pink suit covered in sparkling rhinestones.
In a flashback, doors close on a shaman while Grossberg and the Fey sisters watch with fear. In the present, Wright looks in a filing box.
At the Bando Hotel
Wright rides a bike down the street.
He stops and looks up at a large, imposing building.
Elevator floors light 48, 49, 50, rhinestone
Wright walks down a hallway, and pauses to look out floor to ceiling windows, at the city.
In the office, a desk is held up by 2 muscular headless statues. On the wall is a twin of a painting in Grossberg's office.

BlueCorp President Redd White stands in a pink suit, with rhinestone buttons, rhinestone cufflinks, and a blue and brown polka dot tie. He wears a gold watch, gold rings, and sparkles as he smiles. He has slicked back purple hair.
He places the cufflink on the desk. White looks at his sleeve and shrugs.
White sits up and reaches for the phone.
The view of BlueCorp, seen through a spiders web. A moth's wing falls from the strands.
In a jail cell, lights flicker. Maya rubs her feet.
An officer unlocks the cell. Maya looks up.
Officers lead Phoenix Wright into the cell.
The gates shut. The lights flicker out. Credits roll.
